name: Pocket Wars: Snowdonia
description:
You hold the Time Artifact. Will you use it for good or evil – to Protect or Destroy?

--

Welcome to Pocket Wars: Snowdonia, part of the Pocket Wars: Protect or Destroy series.

Take control of your troops and guide them to victory in this turn based strategy board game for your iPad and iPhone. Bring reinforcements and supplies to an ailing 13th Century Castle in Wales, Britain before the invading Uzgoth can destroy it.

Pocket Wars: Snowdonia is a 3D strategy battle board game designed for people who prefer a relaxed ‘pick up and play’ style game.

Remember those battle games in magazines that you could cut out and play with traditional board game rules? Pocket Wars is reminiscent of those types of game.

The Battle for Snowdonia is the first scenario in the Pocket Wars: Protect or Destroy game and is offered now as a separate and completely free-to-play game.

You'll need to plan your turns and think ahead if you are to be victorious in Snowdonia.

Features:
- 3D turn-based strategy board game
- High resolution graphics and art optimized for iPad
- 10 Unique pieces, some with special moves
- Laid back gaming with 'old-school' turn-based rules
- Voice narrated tutorial teaches you how to play
- Ambient stereo sound and music

If you enjoy Snowdonia, play the full Pocket Wars: Protect or Destroy and become a Protector or Destroyer.

Take on the Snowdonia battle as the evil Uzgoth, or find yourself on the Mining Station and escaping the elemental demons of Io.

Castle Dinas Bran, in the remote environs of the Welsh mountains stands alone. The Uzgoth – demons from another world – will soon have the castle under siege. A minimal complement of men remains at the Castle, their grisly fate all but certain if reinforcements do not arrive soon.

Take on the role of Protector, guide your troops and save Castle Dinas Bran before it's too late.
